article_title: Obamacare Cadillac Tax Is A Lemon, And Businesses Are Slashing Coverage To Avoid It

article_metadata.description: Obamacare's 40% Cadillac excise tax is supposed to raise billions to pay for the law. But most businesses are cutting coverage to avoid the whopping tax hit. Who will pay for Obamacare now?
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
